START-UP:
Lisa is the Marketing Director of BottleRocket, a start-up that merges sustainability and user experience.
She helped build BottleRocket's marketing strategy and crafted material to increase user acquisition and investments.
Want to know more about BottleRocket? %[Yes, please!](postback:startup-yes) %[Not now](postback:startup-no)
YES, PLEASE!:
BottleRocket is the first direct-to-consumer recylcing pick-up service that rewards consumers for everyday recycling.
With BottleRocket's intuitive mobile app, consumers can request pick-ups from their homes, saving them time and money!
Consumers recycle, BottleRocket pays, Earth wins! YAY! %[That's so cool!](postback:so-cool-startup)
THAT'S SO COOL!:
I know, right! Too bad I'm stuck behind this screen, or else I would use it.
Want to learn more about Lisa's work at BottleRocket? %[Definitely](postback:definitely-startup) %[Maybe later](postback:maybe-later-startup)
DEFINITELY:
As the Marketing Director, Lisa helped to develop the start-up's brand and positioning for its target consumers.
She also designed BottleRocket's website, even though she had no prior professional website design experience. %[Wow! How?](postback:startup_how)
WOW! HOW?:

DELL:
At Dell, Lisa worked with the Media Planning team and helped manage all of the team's online campaigns.
She also created an agency evaluation for the Media Planning to use. After conducting the evaluation and analyzing the results, she presented her findings and recommendations the Dell's Marketing leadership team.
HIRERIGHT:
At Dell, Lisa worked with the Media Planning team and helped manage all of the team's online campaigns.
She also created an agency evaluation for the Media Planning to use. After conducting the evaluation and analyzing the results, she presented her findings and recommendations the Dell's Marketing leadership team.
SPIREON:
A part of Spireon's Product Marketing team, Lisa managed the creation of customer-facing content by working with cross-functional teams.
Highlights include developing the messaging for Spireon's lender and rental products, creating content for product brochures and infographics, and managing email campaigns through Marketo.
